name: lifting the veal
description:
A story based RPGMaker game Made for  Emotional Game Jam 2020!

In the near future, multiple robots will by built, each with one mission to make things better for the next race of humans.  However, after meeting his Robotfriend, 1 gains the ability to change his mission. 

Move - Arrow keys 

Select - Enter and Space 

Time took : 38 hours
